title: BCC comments on National Minimum Wage rise (Lincolnshire Chamber of Commerce)
text: ( Source : Lincolnshire Chamber of Commerce ) Commenting on the National Minimum Wage increase - which comes into force today - Adam Marshall , Executive Director of the British Chambers of Commerce , said: 'The changes to the National Minimum
